templates.template: <xhtml:div xmlns:xui='http://www.justep.com/xui' xmlns:xforms='http://www.justep.com/xforms' xmlns:xhtml='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml' component='/UI/system_X/components/boundaryImport.xbl.xml#boundaryImport'> <!-- <result concept="T_DKXX" origin="BA_DKXX" operation="clear">--> <!-- <mapping from="BA_DKXX" to="FGUID" key="true" />--> <!-- <mapping from="fDKMC" to="DKMC" />--> <!-- <mapping from="fTFH" to="TFH" />--> <!-- <mapping from="fDKMJ" to="DKMJ" />--> <!-- <mapping from="fDKMJ" to="DKMJ" />--> <!-- <mapping from="fJZDS" to="JZDS" />--> <!-- <mapping from="fDKYT" to="DKYT" />--> <!-- <mapping from="fZL" to="ZL" />--> <!-- </result>--> <!-- <result concept="T_JZDZBB" origin="BA_ZBXX" operation="clear">--> <!-- <mapping from="fDKXXID" to="FT_DKXX" />--> <!-- <mapping from="fDianH" to="DH" />--> <!-- <mapping from="fQH" to="ZBBS" />--> <!-- <mapping from="fXZB" to="XZB" />--> <!-- <mapping from="fYZB" to="YZB" />--> <!-- </result> --> </xhtml:div>
